name: a + b, a - b, a * b
description:
Simple. You are given the values of a + b and a - b repectively as two parameters: sum and diff

return the value of a * b

By the way, a and b may be the same.

If the sum or difference is a decimal NOT ENDING WITH ```.0```  or ```.00``` or ```.000```  and so on, return None

If it ends with .0 or .00 or .000 and so on, treat it like an integer

e.g. ```9, 5```   returns ```14```

```9.0, 5.00```   returns ```14```

```1, 5.6```      returns ```None```

Try to do this in one line of code!
